title: Is there special punishment for Dowry Deaths?
content:
**Yes!** 

If a woman’s death is caused by any burns or bodily injury or occurs under abnormal circumstances within seven years of her marriage and it is shown that soon before her death she was subjected to cruelty or harassment by her husband or any relatives of her husband for, or in connection with, demand for dowry, such death will be called “dowry death”, and the relatives will be deemed to have caused her death.
